author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43469

#### PR description:

This PR is a follow up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43423/ and implements several different fixes and improvements.
First it fixes the `SiStripHashedDetId` class, both in terms of the copy constructor (472005bd1359618f1bf52a63c728ca3465022a0e) and assignment operator (f1ec80bc58d1798986b6743b3bf03a5491d37304). It also adds a new `size()` public method (38ff1c883a3dac56f317e88b73e961d234e9b7cc).
Then it adds a `catch2`-based unit test for basic `SiStripHashedDetId` operations (done in commits 3edaa3d906f892cc1b4abe27c9a80b0dcc14b56b, b1aa2dd8761f0e14bae16e1c681fcff29d77ddce, ff86f969a04cd0e3637ca965ee8953e28b544dc6).
Finally it improves the filling of the per-module histograms in SiStripLorentzAnglePCLMonitor (commits 3c324b47254b42d38901eeade8ac80962550c530 and b956d97d72fad5bfe92afed2db8ae5e77d45c6bb) as well as adding a dedicated unit test of both the AlCASkimming and AlCaHarvesting steps (00250a4b25405e6818ad52b31d87af98f9a7f3bf).

#### PR validation:

The validation of this PR relies on running the augment battery of unit tests of this package.
Running `scam b runtests` returns

```
Creating test log file logs/slc7_amd64_gcc12/testing.log
Pass    1s ... CalibFormats/SiStripObjects/TestCalibFormatsSiStripObjects
Pass   11s ... CalibFormats/SiStripObjects/testSiStripHashedDetId
Pass    0s ... CalibFormats/SiStripObjects/test_catch2_SiStripHashedDetId
Pass   58s ... CalibTracker/SiStripLorentzAngle/testPromptCalibProdSiStripLA
>> Test sequence completed for CMSSW CMSSW_13_3_X_2023-12-02-1100
```

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Verbatim backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43469 in case there is prolonged cosmics data-taking in 13_3_X.
title: [13.3.X]  Fix `SiStripHashedDetId` constructor / operator and add more SiStripLorentzAngle PCL unit testings
